dcterms:creator: A.X. Zhang
B. Culbertson
P. Paritosh
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing over 9000 discussion threads from Reddit, with more than 100000 comments, each classified into one of nine different discourse act tags, including Announcement, Question, Answer, Elaboration, Humor, Agreement, Disagreement, Appreciation, and Negative reaction.
dcterms:title: Coarse Discourse Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Dutta
D. Das
dcterms:description: An extended version of the Facebook discussion dataset, manually annotated with discourse act labels, containing 20 threads of discussions under posts from various news groups, totaling 1177 comments, primarily focused on contemporary social and political issues.
dcterms:title: Facebook discussion dataset
